channel.title: Private Key on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Private Key on TLDRBins

item.title: GPG
item.description: Basic # Check Version gpg --version # Generate New Key gpg --gen-key # Export Private Key gpg --homedir <GNUPG_DIR> --export-secret-keys --armor > key.asc # Export Public Key gpg --export -a <USER>@<DOMAIN> # Check Keys gpg --list-keys # Import Public Key gpg --import <PUB_KEY> # Encrypt a Message with Public Key (Email from PubKey) gpg --encrypt --armor -r <USER>@<DOMAIN> <FILE> # Decrypt a Message with Our Private Key gpg --homedir <GNUPG_DIR> -d <ENC_FILE> # Sign Our Own Message gpg --clearsign --output - <FILE>

item.title: SSH
item.description: Check SSH version openssh-server (ubuntu) openssh-server (debian) Config Location /etc/ssh/sshd_config # Grep contents grep -Ev "^#" /etc/ssh/sshd_config | grep . Generate SSH Key ssh-keygen #Set filename, leave passphase blank ./id_rsa #After Creation chmod 600 id_rsa Check Public Key ssh-keygen -l -f id_rsa Generate no passphrase SSH key from encrypted key openssl rsa -in id_rsa_encrypted -out ./id_rsa Convert .ppk to .pem format # Install sudo apt install putty-tools # Convert to private key in pem format puttygen key.
